name: Summer Music Festival
description: Experience the ultimate summer vibes at our annual music festival in City Park. Join us for live performances by local bands, food trucks, and fun activities for the whole family.

name: Community Cleanup Day
description: Let's come together to beautify our community! Join us for a day of cleaning up parks, streets, and public spaces. Gloves and trash bags will be provided. Together, we can make a difference!

name: Food Truck Fiesta
description: Savor the flavors of our diverse community at the Food Truck Fiesta in Riverfront Park. Indulge in delicious dishes from a variety of food trucks while enjoying live music and entertainment.

name: Annual Charity Walk
description: Join us for our annual charity walk along the scenic Greenway Trail. Lace up your sneakers and walk with purpose to support local charities and community initiatives. All ages and fitness levels welcome!

name: Cultural Arts Fair
description: Celebrate the rich diversity of our community at the Cultural Arts Fair. Explore cultural exhibits, performances, arts and crafts, and culinary delights from around the world. A vibrant celebration of unity and creativity!
